doc.repnme: Transcript of forty-ninth special meeting of Executive Directors, held on Wednesday, December 17, 1952 : India - Indian Iron and Steel Company and Steel Corporation of Bengal Project
doc.abstracts: This partial transcript, from the session of the Executive Directors held on Wednesday, December 17, 1952, covers only a proposed loan to India for the Indian Iron and Steel Company and Steel Corporation of Bengal Project. The discussion began with an overview of the economic and financial situation in India. It also covered the contribution of steel factories and mills to the Equalization Fund, the shareholders' part in the financing of an improvement in assets, and the commitment charge in dollars although the loan may be spent in other currencies. The Executive Directors resolved to approve the loan.
